job.title: Ecommerce Marketing Strategist - NetSuite/Data Analysis
job.description:
If you are a Ecommerce Marketing Specialist with experience, please read on!
Job Title:
Ecommerce Marketing Specialist
Location:
REMOTE
Salary:
$65-85K
Requirements:
Bachelors Degree with 3+ years of Ecommerce and Email Marketing Experience
This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking a growing team in a dynamic industry!
Additional ways in which a candidate may stand out would be:
WordPress
Enjoys working with data and a proven analytical mindset
Personally passionate about digital marketing, web design, behavioral economics and psychology
What's In It for You
Vacation/PTO
Medical
Dental
Vision
What You Will Be Doing
Work with IT & Systems to execute and manage digital marketing plans
Data analysis - Analysis of campaign and customer data to gain insights leading to improvement in marketing performance
Google Analytics to diagnosis performance issues and identification of actions to resolve
Drive improvement in copy, messaging, and design across web and email channels
Conversion rate optimization of eCommerce website and email marketing activity
Define marketing technology requirements, assist in evaluating options & delivering solutions
Translate marketing needs into the language of IT specialists
Create business cases and deliver on agreed ideas
Create campaign strategy & briefs to support new and existing products
What You Need for this Position
Bachelors Degree preferred
2+ years CRM experience - NetSuite preferred
3+ years eCommerce and email marketing
Data driven marketing background
Excel skills, including formulae and pivot tables
Google Analytics - strong experience
Solid understanding of split testing strategy, sample sizes & statistics
Good knowledge of research tools, including running Surveys, Hotjar or similar
Google Optimize or other web split test tools - prior experience
Web design, user experience and branding projects
Internet and digital marketing technology
So, if you are a Ecommerce Marketing Strategist with 3+ years of experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
